test.name: count_aggregation_comparison
test.query: SELECT count(), count(BY UserID % {group_scale}), count(TOTALS) FROM hits_100m_obfuscated GROUP BY CounterID, UserID % {group_scale} FORMAT Null
SELECT count() OVER (PARTITION BY CounterID, UserID % {group_scale}), count() OVER (PARTITION BY UserID), count() OVER () FROM hits_100m_obfuscated FORMAT Null
SELECT count() FROM hits_100m_obfuscated GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((CounterID, UserID % {group_scale}), (CounterID),()) FORMAT Null
